name: VR Maze Solver Adventure
description:
Escape from our Vr Maze in the shortest time possible. There are 9 levels to solve and complete.

How to Play:
To control your movement you have to rotate your head with VR headset on your head. If you get tired, you can look down for 2 seconds and you will exit a level.

Note: This app requires a VR headset (Google Cardboard, Durovis Dive, Dodocase VR, VRelia GO, Homido, Gear VR) for best results.

If you like our game, please give it a rate and a review.
